text: The Cave Creek disaster occurred on 28 April 1995. A scenic viewing platform in Paparoa National Park, New Zealand, collapsed. The collapse resulted in the deaths of 14 people. The victims, 13 of whom were university students, fell onto rocks below. ==References== Category:Disasters in the 1990s Category:20th century in New Zealand Category:April 1995 events Category:1990s in Oceania Category:Disasters in New Zealand
title: Cave Creek disaster
